ref_item.label: RIST4721
ref_item.description: RIST4721 as once-daily 300mg oral solution for 28 days.

pred_item.label: RIST4721 300 mg once daily
pred_item.description: Adult subjects with moderate to severe palmoplantar pustulosis received oral RIST4721 300 mg solution once daily for 28 days.

ref_item.label: Placebo
ref_item.description: Placebo as once-daily 300mg oral solution for 28 days.

pred_item.label: Placebo once daily
pred_item.description: Adult subjects with moderate to severe palmoplantar pustulosis received matching oral placebo solution once daily for 28 days.

pred_item.name: RIST4721 oral solution 300 mg
pred_item.description: RIST4721, a small molecule CXCR2 antagonist, administered as a 300 mg oral solution once daily for 28 days to treat moderate to severe palmoplantar pustulosis.

pred_item.name: Placebo oral solution
pred_item.description: Matching placebo oral solution administered once daily for 28 days, used as a comparator to RIST4721 in subjects with moderate to severe palmoplantar pustulosis.

ref_item.measure: Log Transformed Ratio of Postbaseline Fresh Pustule Count at Day 28 to Baseline
ref_item.description: Relative change from baseline in fresh pustule count at Day 28

pred_item.measure: Relative change from baseline in fresh pustule count
pred_item.description: Relative change from baseline in the number of fresh pustules on the palms and/or soles, where fresh pustules are defined as macroscopically visible pustules that are white/yellow in color with no brown color, with or without crust, present on the glabrous skin of the palms and/or soles.

ref_item.measure: Log Transformed Ratio of Postbaseline Total Pustule Count at Day 28 to Baseline
ref_item.description: Relative change from baseline in total pustule count at Day 28

pred_item.measure: Relative change from baseline in total pustule count
pred_item.description: Relative change from baseline in the total number of pustules (fresh plus non-fresh) on the palms and/or soles.
